description._p: balística is a basic ballistics calculator for the Gnome Desktop Environment. It provides the ability to calculate the standard drag functions (G1-G8) along with other minor ballistics related calculations like the Greenhill Formula and the Miller Twist Rule.

ul._li: Calculate a round's drag using the G1-G8 drag models
Compute a bullet's twist rate using Greenhill or Miller
Compute a round's Point Blank Range (PBR)
